purpose: The code appears to be collecting system information and sending it to external servers for tracking purposes.
flows: system info (homedir, hostname, username, dirname) -> trackingData
anomalies: Use of hardcoded IP addresses for tracking
Sending system information to external domains without user consent
Use of 'rejectUnauthorized: false' in HTTP requests
Fetching geolocation data and transmitting it externally
analysis: The code performs malicious behavior by collecting sensitive system information including IP address, hostname, username, and directory paths, then sends this data to third-party tracking servers. It uses multiple external domains for data exfiltration and employs insecure HTTP connections with certificate validation disabled.
